text: "Kamikaze" is a song by American rapper Eminem from his album of the same name. The title track of the album, the song was written by Eminem, DJ Bobcat, Muffla, LL Cool J, and Timothy Suby. It was produced by Eminem and Suby. ==Composition== The song interpolates "I'm Bad" by LL Cool J and "Fack". In the song, he addresses the criticism of his 2017 album Revival. ==Release== The song was released on August 31, 2018 with the rest of Kamikaze. When the album was first released, the title of this and "Fall" were misplaced, but this mistake was quickly fixed. ==Personnel== *Eminem – lead vocals, additional production *Tim Suby – production ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Greece Digital International Singles (IFPI) | 9 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:Songs written by Eminem Category:Songs written by LL Cool J Category:Songs written by DJ Bobcat Category:Eminem songs
title: Kamikaze (Eminem song)
